AT_TRANSFER_GATE - states.EPilot.State
 
atTransferGate() - Method in class monitor.DepartureAirport
Transition state: The pilot is at the Transfer Gate and if not all passengers were already transported, He increments the number of flights, clears the passengersInPlane queue and now he's ready for a new boarding.

waitForFlight() - Method in class monitor.DepartureAirport
Blocking state: If not all passengers were already transported, the Hostess waits for a signal from Pilot to start waiting for passengers
waitForNextFlight - states.EHostess.readyToFly
 
waitForNextPassenger - states.EHostess.checkPassenger
 
waitForPassenger() - Method in class monitor.DepartureAirport
Blocking state: If there are no passengers left in the queue and the plane's capacity was reached or there are no more passengers in the simulation to transport, the Hostess will inform that the plane is ready to take off, if not, the Hostess will check the Documents of the passengers in the queue if there are any.
waitingForBoarding() - Method in class monitor.Plane
Blocking State: Pilot is waken up by the hostess when boarding is complete
